name: Coconut Shore
description: Story  The beach , "Coconut Shore" located in a small town- Hope town, is all dumped with trash and that no one visits it anymore.The beach gets unnoticed for years as it  is turning into a dump yard. The locality nearby by is affected as well as the fishes in  the sea are dying. The mayor of the town approaches for help from an NGO in order to get the beach cleaned as summer's on the way.                     Objective Keep the beach clean and earn as much money as you can. Also manage the resources.                  Follow Ardiente Games  Tanishka Shareef https://www.instagram.com/ardientegames/ Abhishek Dhamne https://www.instagram.com/nowshake_/ Deepanjali Sarna  https://www.instagram.com/stillvisionart/ Lokesh Prasad  https://www.instagram.com/loku_lp/ Saksham Chopra https://www.instagram.com/5aksh/
